TroyCoin.place_bet() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c356e4c7f8aa8445c0200da05ea909db46077219_TroyCoin.sol#138-162) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- bet_val = divider / divisor (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c356e4c7f8aa8445c0200da05ea909db46077219_TroyCoin.sol#147)
	- taxed = (bet_val * bet_tax) / 100 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c356e4c7f8aa8445c0200da05ea909db46077219_TroyCoin.sol#155)
